member.name: IMFCapturePhotoSink.SetOutputByteStream
member.summary: Specifies a byte stream that will receive the still image data.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of a byte stream. The byte stream must be writable.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePhotoSink.SetOutputFileName
member.summary: Specifies the name of the output file for the still image.
member.param: A null-terminated string that contains the URL of the output file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePhotoSink.SetSampleCallback
member.summary: Sets a callback to receive the still-image data.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. The caller must implement this interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePhotoSink
member.summary: Controls the photo sink. The photo sink captures still images from the video stream.
